product_name: La Sportiva Thunder III Mid GTX Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: Well suited for backpacking and hiking on moderate to rugged trails, the waterproof La Sportiva Thunder III GTX Hiking Boots for women feature Vibram(R) soles and half steel shanks for performance. Nubuck leather/Cordura(R) nylon uppers have GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable membranes that are guaranteed to keep your feet dry on wet days. Molded rubber heel stabilizers give sturdy ankle support on rough terrain. Vibram(R) River outsoles with Impact Brake System(TM) provide no-slip traction when you're hiking up and down hills.
short_description: Well suited for backpacking and hiking on moderate to rugged trails, the waterproof La Sportiva Thunder III GTX Hiking Boots for women feature Vibram(R) soles and half steel shanks for performance.
